definitions.definition: A small shield , especially one of an approximately elliptical form, or crescent -shaped.
A crescent -shaped design used in mosaics .
A flat apothecium with no rim .
A crescent-shaped sheet of microtubules that encircles the base of the flagella of a protozoan .

main_definition: ( historical ) A small shield , especially one of an approximately elliptical form, or crescent -shaped.
secondary_definitions: ( art , historical ) A crescent -shaped design used in mosaics .
( botany ) A flat apothecium with no rim .
( microbiology ) A crescent-shaped sheet of microtubules that encircles the base of the flagella of a protozoan .
